title: How long till low priority que expires?
body: In case I want to play an ARAM or something in the future, how long do I have to wait before the que timer expires?

replies.body: it depends on how many times you've had leaver buster (low priority que) the first time its 5 minutes each time for 5 games. After that its 10 minutes for 5 ques, then 20 minutes for 5 ques (it stays at 20 minutes each time thereafter.)
